column2: # calculate risk scores and filter to intermediate troponin levels
# calculate using raw data for baseline table purposes
precise_w_scores <- calc_scores(data = precise_clean) %>% filter(stratified == "hs-cTni 5 ng/L to 99th Centile")
# calculate using imputated data for analysis
precise_w_scores_imp <- calc_scores(data = precise) %>% filter(stratified == "hs-cTni 5 ng/L to 99th Centile")
rm(precise, precise_clean, ASCVD, calc_scores, Cleanit, EDACSpre, GRACEC, HEARTprec, impute, merge_data, score2, TIMIC)
